name: Keep Going (SBSonk)
description:
A thrilling journey through the stars! Take control of a powerful rocket and fly through the endless void of space.  Except the game gets faster. Rely on your fast reactions and decision making to weave through the endless void of space obstacles!

Collect coins and power-ups along the way to customize your rocket with unique designs and trails or upgrade your rocket and go even farther on the next run!

Controls:

  • A-D / Left-Right - Move left/right
  • Shift + Move left/right - Dash
  • Touch screen - Move to position
  • Flick screen - Dash

Credits:

  • Calm Ambience 2 - The Cynic Project
  • Rocket Launch SFX - dklon
  • Base Sprites - Loni
  • Bug Testing - xMsa
